title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node.js and modern browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models. Lets you use Ollama LLMs in LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface). Runs entirely in browser, no data leaves your machine.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client for Ollama. Maven/Gradle dependency to integrate Ollama into JVM apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama. gem install ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Bash wrapper that adds model search, download progress bars and simple chat shortcuts to the official CLI.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama completions into the editor like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset-ai. Use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C#/.NET client for Ollama. NuGet package OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama. Async/tokio first, serde powered.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service with any model for use in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that proxies Slack messages to Ollama and posts back responses.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Kotlin multiplatform HTTP client for Ollama. Works on JVM, Android, iOS and macOS.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama’s REST API with GenServer-style process management.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfile recipes for quantized and fine-tuned models ready to pull.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + LangChain in a single Python notebook.
